item.title: Book Opening
item.dc:creator: @Project_Ferrari_Scap Project Ferrari Scape
item.description:
@Project_Ferrari_Scap wrote:

Okay. So Far I Got.

case 600: // Magic Book sendMessage("You read the ancient magic words!"); SlayerQuest(); break;
public void SlayerQuest() { 
sendQuest("Welcome To The Slayer Quest!", 4913);
sendQuest("Made By: Killa, Korkle, Deception, All Other Staff.", 4911);
sendQuest("Kill All Npc's.", 4914);
sendQuest("Use The Key With The Ball.", 4915);
sendQuest("Good Luck!", 4918);
sendQuest("You'll Need It.", 4916);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(4909);
    flushOutStream();
}</blockquote>

What DO I change To Make It Look Like A Book When it opens?
So I can Flip Threw The Pages?

Read full topic
